text: Men senndi ɓe gori sappo e ɗiɗi mofte. Men wahyini e Muusaa tuma nde yimɓe makko ɓen ɗaɓɓirnoo mo yarnineede wonnde : "Piyir tuggordu maa ndun hayre nden". Ɓulli sappo e ɗiɗi yallti e mayre. Gomɗii gorol kala andii yariride mu'un. Men ɗowdinirani ɓe duule, Men Jippini e maɓɓe demmbe-njuuri, e teewu colli. "Ñaamee e laaɓuɗi ɗi Men arsiki on". Ɓe tooñaali Men, kono ko wonkiiji maɓɓe ɓe tooñaynoo
